/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and grass, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the varied hues of the buildings.
